nodes.documentation: Interface signature for the required methods needed for calling the Interface token
nodes.name: IInterfaceToken

nodes.documentation: @title SimpleArtistContract V2
nodes.name: SimpleArtistContractV2

nodes.documentation: @dev Throws if called by any account other than the artist.
nodes.name: onlyArtist

nodes.documentation: @dev Throws if the contract is fixed
nodes.name: onlyWhenNotFixed

nodes.documentation: @dev allows payment direct to contract - if no token will store value on contract

arguments.value: Cant buy any more blocks - token already used

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Cant buy any more blocks - token already used"

nodes.documentation:
@dev purchase blocks with your Token ID to be displayed for a specific amount of blocks
@param _tokenId the InterfaceToken token ID
nodes.name: purchase

nodes.documentation: @dev Checks to see if the token has already purchased blocks
nodes.name: tokenAlreadyUsed

nodes.documentation: @dev Checks to see if the maximum number of purchases have been made
nodes.name: exceedsMaxInvocations

nodes.documentation: @dev Returns the total number invocations recorded for this contract
nodes.name: totalInvocations

nodes.documentation: @dev Returns the total number invocations recorded for this contract
nodes.name: getTokenInvocations

nodes.documentation: @dev Returns the allowed number of interactions left on the contract
nodes.name: remainingInvocations

nodes.documentation: @dev Attempts to work out the next block which will be funded
nodes.name: nextPurchasableBlocknumber

nodes.documentation: @dev Returns the blocks which the provided token has purchased
nodes.name: blocknumbersOf

nodes.documentation: @dev Return token ID for the provided block or 0 when not found
nodes.name: tokenIdOf

nodes.documentation:
@dev Get the block hash the given block number
@param _blocknumber the block to generate hash for
nodes.name: getPurchasedBlockhash

nodes.documentation: @dev Generates default block hash behaviour - helps with tests
nodes.name: nativeBlockhash

nodes.documentation:
@dev Generates a unique token hash for the token
@return the hash and its associated block
nodes.name: nextHash

nodes.documentation: @dev Returns blocknumber - helps with tests
nodes.name: blocknumber

nodes.documentation: @dev Toggles the contract between allowing and preventing double purchases
nodes.name: togglePreventDoublePurchases

arguments.value: Cannot set max invocations to less then 1

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Cannot set max invocations to less then 1"

nodes.documentation: @dev Can control the max invocations allowed
nodes.name: setMaxInvocations

nodes.documentation: @dev Sets the application checksum, assume the bytes32 is a sha256 has of the application
nodes.name: setApplicationChecksum

arguments.value: Cannot set a zero fee split

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Cannot set a zero fee split"

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Optional split plus founders fee cannot be more than 100%"

nodes.documentation: @dev Ability to define optional fee split and percentage
nodes.name: setOptionalFeeSplit

nodes.documentation:
@dev Utility function for updating min blocks
@param _minBlockPurchaseInOneGo min blocks per purchase
nodes.name: setMinBlockPurchaseInOneGo

nodes.documentation:
@dev Utility function for only show purchased
@param _onlyShowPurchased flag for only showing purchased hashes
